South Korea, US to start defence cost talks early, before U.S. elections-mediaSouth Korea and the United States have agreed to start early talks on how to share the cost of keeping U.S. forces in the country in a bid to reach a deal before the possible reelection of Donald Trump as president, local media reported on Tuesday. Tue, 16 Jan 2024 08:50:32 GMT XPHBNCUSPZLOVKAGOF5DRXOJTY https://www.reuters.com/world/south-korea-us-start-defence-cost-talks-early-before-us-elections-media-2024-01-16/Hyonhee Shin世界
Some wealthier Chinese say they can't afford marriage as economy slowsVictor Li is determined to get married soon, but like many other young Chinese grappling with an uncertain economic outlook, the well-heeled Shanghai entrepreneur isn't sure he can afford to. Tue, 16 Jan 2024 08:44:05 GMT 2OOVH75WHNPS5MYUSCLFNTP6HU https://www.reuters.com/world/china/some-wealthier-chinese-say-they-cant-afford-marriage-economy-slows-2024-01-16/Nicoco Chan世界中国
Taiwan premier says Cabinet will resign in accordance with past practiceTaiwan Premier Chen Chien-jen said on Tuesday that the Cabinet will resign in accordance with past constitutional practice before the new parliament meets next month after the ruling party lost its majority in the legislature. Tue, 16 Jan 2024 08:20:33 GMT C6TEJRPQDNK4PBBTBSZGRF6SSU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-premier-says-cabinet-will-resign-accordance-with-past-practice-2024-01-16/Reuters世界亚太地区
Japan's Tepco to start fourth release of treated Fukushima water in late FebTokyo Electric Power Company (Tepco) plans to start a fourth release of treated radioactive water from the wrecked Fukushima Daiichi Nuclear Power Plant in late February, an official said on Tuesday, continuing a move criticised by China. Tue, 16 Jan 2024 08:03:51 GMT 55HRRPGB3N5PATBKF25H6EMLTNY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/japan-tepco-start-fourth-release-treatment-fukushima-water-late-feb-2024-01-16/Katya Golubkova世界亚太地区
Solid state: EV giants chase 'holy grail' of batteriesSolid-state batteries hold the promise of more energy storage, longer driving ranges and faster charging for next-generation electric vehicles. Yet despite decades of research and billions of dollars invested, their future still looks elusive. Tue, 16 Jan 2024 06:08:18 GMT BIRUT5GCDJLIREAUXY5YFCZ3WY https://www.reuters.com/technology/solid-state-ev-giants-chase-holy-grail-batteries-2024-01-16/Eric Onstad技术被破坏
China's Premier Li to address Davos as its economy strugglesChinese Premier Li Qiang is set to address global investors and politicians in Davos on Tuesday, as Beijing grapples with a sluggish post-pandemic recovery and a real estate slump. Tue, 16 Jan 2024 06:04:06 GMT NHP3SQKWIBK7PDSK3TEJP6NHLI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/chinas-premier-li-address-davos-its-economy-struggles-2024-01-16/Antoni Slodkowski商业达沃斯
